channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee,LLC -- McAfee Database Security (DBSec)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee,LLC -- McAfee Database Security (DBSec)

item.title: CVE-2021-23894|2024-08-03T19:14:09.394Z -- mcafee%2Cllc -- mcafee%20database%20security%20%28dbsec%29
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability in McAfee Database Security (DBSec) prior to 4.8.2 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to create a reverse shell with administrator privileges on the DBSec server via carefully constructed Java serialized object sent to the DBSec server.

item.title: CVE-2021-23896|2024-08-03T19:14:09.467Z -- mcafee%2Cllc -- mcafee%20database%20security%20%28dbsec%29
item.description: Cleartext Transmission of Sensitive Information vulnerability in the administrator interface of McAfee Database Security (DBSec) prior to 4.8.2 allows an administrator to view the unencrypted password of the McAfee Insights Server used to pass data to the Insights Server. This user is restricted to only have access to DBSec data in the Insights Server.

item.title: CVE-2021-23895|2024-08-03T19:14:09.408Z -- mcafee%2Cllc -- mcafee%20database%20security%20%28dbsec%29
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability in McAfee Database Security (DBSec) prior to 4.8.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker to create a reverse shell with administrator privileges on the DBSec server via carefully constructed Java serialized object sent to the DBSec server.
